    Prediction.predictFutureHybrid(StockData stockData, double sentimentScore)
    Generates a sequence of hybrid future predictions by iteratively predicting the next point using a combination of SMA, linear regression, Holt smoothing, and sentiment adjustments.
    static PredictionResult
    Prediction.predictFutureHybridSinglePoint(StockData stockData, double sentimentScore)
    Produces a single next-day hybrid price prediction by combining Simple Moving Average, linear regression, Holt smoothing, and applying sentiment adjustment.
    PredictionResult

    Calculates the Simple Moving Average (SMA) prediction over the given period.
